The Tia Maria mine has faced significant delays due to community opposition and environmental concerns, but development has resumed. Web search geocoded. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tia_Maria_mine. The Tia Maria mine is a large copper deposit located in the south of Peru in the province of Islay, Arequipa Region. The project has faced significant delays due to local opposition and environmental concerns

web_search_companies.notes: Southern Copper Corporation is a subsidiary of Grupo Mexico.
